content: www rubyandthefoxes com sarah@rubyandthefoxes com reusable christmas cracker hat ©copyright sarah holmes 2020 no part of this publication may be reproduced or distributed in any form without the written permission of the copyright holder this pattern is not to be used for commercial purpose all rights reserved www rubyandthefoxes com sarah@rubyandthefoxes com reusable christmas cracker hat materials 1 x pair 4mm knitting needles 6 us 8 old uk 1 x large eyed sewing needle double knitting yarn abbreviations k knit m1 make a stitch by picking up the bar in between the stitches and knitting into it pattern cast on 10 stitches we will be working in knit garter stitch for the whole of this pattern row 1 k to end row 2 k all except last stitch m1 k1 row 3 k to end row 4-21 repeat row 2 and 3 by the end of row 21 you should have 20 stitches this is the top of your first crown point row 22 k to end cast off 1 stitch at the end of the row row 23 k to end row 24-41 repeat row 22 and 23 by the end of row 41 you should have 10 stitches again that is 1 crown point complete repeat row 2-41 to create as many crown points as needed to fit around your head with a little stretch mine was 5 times when you ve got it to the right length cast off and sew the 2 short edges together you are done now you can place them in your reusable christmas crackers ©copyright sarah holmes 2020 no part of this publication may be reproduced or distributed in any form without the written permission of the copyright holder this pattern is not to be used for commercial purpose all rights reserved
